text:
All right.
You get first, Michele.

Here is a clip
featuring a young man

who tried to lay
some serious pipe.
[ Laughter ]

So a 16 year old...
[ Audience gasping ]

...in Johor, Malaysia,
has had to be rescued

after getting his penis
stuck inside a toilet pipe.
[ Laughter ]

He's said to have put his penis
in the pipe

which protrudes
out of the wall.

His privates then swelled
and became stuck.

He's a kid.
-Yeah.

He saw a pipe, and he was like,
as with all teenage boys,

"I'm gonna put
my [bleep] in that."

-Yeah.
-So he did.

Right, right.
We've all been there, guys.

And -- yeah.
It wasn't a problem
until he flushed.

My favorite fact about this
is that they've now sealed up

the hole to stop it
from ever happening again.

This is why we can't
have anything nice.
Yeah, yep.

Well, it hurts for sure.
It definitely hurts.

It's embarrassing.
Embarrassing as all...

He, you know, he doesn't know
if it's going to fall off.

Who knows? I think it's higher
than both of these.

I agree. I'm going to go
it's higher than both.

Yeah, I like that.
Jameela: You think
it's higher than both?

I think it's higher than both.
I think it's higher.
Let's see what our shrinks say.

Michele: Come on, get it.
All right.
I'm feeling 70s.

I'm feeling low 70s.
Go, go, go and drop,
drop, drop.
[ Cheers and applause ]

Yeah!
Oh, my God!

$500!
Oh, my God.

You have just banked $500,
congratulations.

I feel like Michele was going to
pick up the whole podium
and crack it in two.

Maher, please take a look
at this chilling ice-capade.

So this is a race
down a glacier...
Oh, no. Oh, no.

...but it all starts to go
a little bit pear-shaped here

and then the whole thing
just goes tits up.

People start falling
all the way up the hill.
He's falling off the side.
Wow.

You basically caused the injury
of 1 million people on that one.

-Exactly.
-Yeah.
And it's all your fault.

Yeah.
So that's gonna...

Yeah,
but at the end of the day,

all you did was get into
a little bike accident.
A little?

You got to take all those --
Where was there a little?

You got to take all those
other people out of it.

You got to take them
all out of it.

That happened to them.
He did take them out.

He got me.
He got me on that one.

All right.
Okay, I'm sorry.

I'm saying above.
I'm saying above both.

All right.
Let's see what our shrinks say.
Good luck.

-Come on, come on.
-66 and up.
-Yeah, 66.

A thousand people crashed
on a mountain.

Go, come on.
So much pain.

Go, go, go, go.
So much pain.
Stay!

Come on, it's got
to be higher.
Stay!

It's coming back.
It's coming back.
Please come back.
Jameela: Oh, my God.
You are correct.
That was insanely close.
Oh, my God.
